sentences.english: Therefor, namely given "global village" this nickname.
sentences.chinese: 因之，即赋予了“地球村”这一爱称。

sentences.english: It was an affectionate family, hence all four of its members had pet names.
sentences.chinese: 这是个和睦的家庭，所以全家四口都有爱称。

sentences.english: Just started you to shout "pet name" time, my first came out.
sentences.chinese: 刚开始你在喊“爱称”的时候，我第一个出来了。
给他们一个特别的爱称。

sentences.english: You may choose to sign only your first name or a nickname you use with that reader.
sentences.chinese: 你还是可以只签你与收信人打交道常用的名字或爱称。

sentences.english: See Jackie Evans just wake up the, calling her nickname, the princess.
sentences.chinese: 埃利正好醒来看到杰姬，叫着她的爱称，公主。

sentences.english: Tom is the pet name of Thomas.
